name: Yallaiah_Onteru
title: Data Engineer AI/ML Pipelines
professional_summary: Designed and operationalized production-grade pipelines in cloud environments using Azure Data Factory and Databricks, ensuring seamless integration with AI/ML applications.
Collaborated with data scientists to translate modeling goals into data deliverables, utilizing version control with Git and Agile development methodologies for CI/CD.
Developed and deployed ML-oriented tools such as MLflow and TensorFlow Extended (TFX) to power AI/ML workflows, ensuring scalability and reliability.
Engineered robust data infrastructure that powered analytics and machine learning across the enterprise, leveraging distributed data systems and cloud platforms (Azure).
Partnered with software engineers and warehouse ops to understand requirements and deliver actionable, ML-ready data, focusing on innovation, mentorship, and real-world AI/ML impact.
Utilized database design and management skills to ensure production-grade pipelines, using tools like dbt, Spark, and Delta Lake for data transformation and processing.
Implemented API design and microservices using orchestration tools like Airflow and Kafka, ensuring seamless integration with AI/ML applications.
Ensured data quality and governance through experience with data governance and data quality tools, and knowledge of cloud security and compliance best practices.
Developed and deployed containerized solutions using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring scalability and reliability in cloud environments.
Collaborated with data scientists to develop and deploy machine learning models, using tools like scikit-learn and TensorFlow, ensuring accurate predictions and reliable results.
Implemented real-time data ingestion and processing using tools like Kinesis and Spark, ensuring timely and accurate data analysis.
Utilized Databricks and Azure Data Factory to design and operationalize production-grade pipelines, ensuring seamless integration with AI/ML applications.
Developed and deployed data transformation and processing pipelines using tools like dbt, Spark, and Delta Lake, ensuring accurate and reliable data analysis.
Collaborated with data science teams to develop and deploy machine learning models, using tools like scikit-learn and TensorFlow, ensuring accurate predictions and reliable results.
Implemented data governance and data quality tools, ensuring accurate and reliable data analysis, and adhering to cloud security and compliance best practices.

Developed and deployed containerized solutions using Docker and Kubernetes, ensuring scalability and reliability in cloud environments, and partnering with software engineers and warehouse ops to understand requirements and deliver actionable, ML-ready data, focusing on innovation, mentorship, and real-world AI/ML impact.
